definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
just as in the past (idiom); as before/continuing as always

sentences.english: Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival, but I get up late as usual.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中秋节，但我还是一如往常的晚起。

sentences.english: Versatility. Just like Phelps in the pool.
sentences.chinese: 一如菲尔普斯在泳池上那么多才多艺。

sentences.english: The Sri Lankan government will as always adhere to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 斯政府将一如既往地坚持一个中国政策。

sentences.english: We always offer the best price, high-quality products and best services for customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们将一如即住地提拱高质量的产品和最优质的服务。

sentences.english: While gaokao fever is as strong as ever this year, criticism is mounting.
sentences.chinese: 虽然今年的高考热一如既往，但批评声音也越来越多。

sentences.english: Like your character, like jumping lively and brilliant, like candy, as the spring breeze.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢你的性格，就像跳跳糖一样活泼灿烂，一如春风。

sentences.english: The Weill family were very close-knit, as were many immigrant Jewish families of that era.
sentences.chinese: 一如当年许多犹太移民家族，魏尔家也是非常团结的。

sentences.english: eBay has consistently had one of the ugliest websites on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 易趣网依旧一如既往的丑。

sentences.english: True to form, Finnie is much more interested in talking about her students.
sentences.chinese: 范尼还是一如既往地更乐意谈论她的学生们。

sentences.english: As always, thanks for checking out our photo collections!
sentences.chinese: 一如既往，谢谢你观赏我们的图片集。

sentences.english: I feel as well and strong as ever.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得身强力壮一如以往。

sentences.english: On that fateful day Faida was on the same road she always took after working in the peanut fields.
sentences.chinese: 在其遭难的那天，菲达一如往常地走在同一条路上。

sentences.english: For even as He loves the arrows that flies, so He loves also the bow that is stable.
sentences.chinese: 因为他爱那飞出的箭，一如他爱那安稳的弓。

sentences.english: Just as use water blunt Long Miao, may attain?
sentences.chinese: 一如用水去冲龙庙，可能做到吗？

sentences.english: The wind of anguish still hauls on them as usual.
sentences.chinese: 苦恼之风依然卷走它们一如往昔。

sentences.english: The aim of the Co. is to protect the brand of "Yulong" for ever.
sentences.chinese: 一如既往地维护“玉龙”品牌是公司的目标。

definition: back to where we were (idiom); absolutely no improvement/Things haven't changed at all.
